title: Rustc panicked at 'found unstable fingerprints...

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust use std::fs::File; use std::io::Error; fn main() -> Result<(), Error > { let mut f = File::open("d:\\play")?; println! ( "{:?}", f.metadata()? ); Ok(()) } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.52.0-beta.7 (9a1dfd2dc 2021-04-30) binary: rustc commit-hash: 9a1dfd2dc5c42a2ee84b4606aa08cdadf8c0ee87 commit-date: 2021-04-30 host: x86_64-pc-windows-msvc release: 1.52.0-beta.7 LLVM version: 12.0.0 ``` ### Error output ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'found unstable fingerprints for predicates_of(core[c0d5]::ops::function::Fn): GenericPredicates { parent: None, predicates: [(Binder(TraitPredicate(>)), C:\Users\mmatic\.rustup\toolchains\beta-x86_64-pc-windows-msvc\lib/rustlib/src/rust\library\core\src\ops\function.rs:67:21: 67:32 (#0)), (Binder(TraitPredicate()), C:\Users\mmatic\.rustup\toolchains\beta-x86_64-pc-windows-msvc\lib/rustlib/src/rust\library\core\src\ops\function.rs:67:14: 67:18 (#0)), (Binder(TraitPredicate(>)), C:\Users\mmatic\.rustup\toolchains\beta-x86_64-pc-windows-msvc\lib/rustlib/src/rust\library\core\src\ops\function.rs:67:1: 67:32 (#0))] }', /rustc/9a1dfd2dc5c42a2ee84b4606aa08cdadf8c0ee87\compiler\rustc_query_system\src\query\plumbing.rs:593:5 ```
Backtrace
